extendedInfo.description: Radio Paradise is a unique blend of many styles and genres of music, carefully selected and mixed by two real human beings - enhanced by a dazzling photo slideshow, tied in thematically with the songs that are playing. There's nothing else that's quite like it.You'll hear modern and classic rock, world music, electronica, even a bit of classical and jazz - with no random computer-generated playlists, needless chatter, or commercials. The mix always includes a carefully-selected assortment of new songs & artists, many of which you won't hear anywhere else.Our specialty is taking a diverse assortment of songs and making them flow together in a way that makes sense harmonically, rhythmically, and lyrically an art that, to us, is the very essence of radio. Radio Paradise is also a community. Each song is accompanied by the thoughts & comments about it from your fellow Radio Paradise listeners.Discover why people all over the world make Radio Paradise their all-day every day soundtrack.

reviews.title: Great station & app!
reviews.comment: Excellent station with a REAL live DJ. Easy to use app. I especially like the slideshow - it compliments the music with amazing photography.
reviews.author: Michael M

reviews.title: No sound
reviews.comment: The station is great.   But the app does not work for me. Song info and lyrics are shown but there is no sound. Volume is on.   LG-P705
reviews.author: Vitalii Khustochka

reviews.title: Amazing.
reviews.comment: SOLID app with well thought out and useful features. I absolutely love the songs they play. I usually don\'t like internet radio but this station and app are exceptional! WELL DONE.
reviews.author: Brandon Owens

reviews.title: RP for now and for ever..
reviews.comment: If your having problems with this app. Just google  RP for androids and there is an app that is different from this app and it works great on my google play friendly tablet.. There simply isn\'t any station that can be a competitor with RP they are the very best !! Bill told me to say that ... no it truly is very fine.. Try and you will never go any where else ..
reviews.author: Robert Root

reviews.title: I Love it!
reviews.comment: My favorite station.
reviews.author: ESCAPE Comp

reviews.comment: Adore
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love RP
reviews.comment: The new app looks and sounds great. I\'m proud to support the best station on the web. Don\'t forget the tip jar if this station makes you happy.
reviews.author: Richard Britton

reviews.comment: Works awesomely as advertised!
reviews.author: Bryan Luksus

reviews.title: RP rocks
reviews.comment: Been listening to RP for years, nice to have the app now.  I listen to RP all day at home now its jamming in the ride.
reviews.author: eric mercer

reviews.comment: Woohoo...great improvements.  Love the lyrics and being able to see RP\'s comment board.
reviews.author: Sean Kirschner

reviews.title: Great User Interface
reviews.comment: RP is a fantastic station already.! This new app update makes for a great and fun experience with the new features !
reviews.author: Randal Westrick

reviews.title: Nice App - Geat Music
reviews.comment: The app is free, but don\'t forget the music costs money to broadcast.  If you like the station, then show some love and send your support.
reviews.author: Tom Boward

reviews.title: Latest Version Omission  --  Already Rectified
reviews.comment: Latest update 12/4/13 has installed Slideshow & PSD as standard.  The slideshow being on my tablet is a superb enhancement HOWEVER I specifically use this RP App on my bedside tablet so that I can listen to the superb Radio Paradise as I fall to sleep.  The old App had a timer function to auto switch off.  This has been removed / is missing from slideshow version.  ALSO - the old version allowed tablet screen to turn off = total darkness when listening at night  -  this is no longer an option.   PLEASE RECTIFY.  UPDATE 15/4/13 -   Cratorsoft you are the best.   The timer option reinstated already.   Thanks
reviews.author: James Messenger

reviews.title: Latest ver finally worthy of RP!
reviews.comment: I have loved Bill\'s site for years and was grateful and excited when I could at last bring it with me where ever I went - even if the app was clunky.  Well clunky is it no more!  Besides being gorgeous now in HD Slideshow mode (just turn the phone sideways and flip out my case\'s kickstand) and supporting the great PSD feature, I no longer have to bounce between the phone\'s browser and the app to get song info and rate a song.  Absolutely great job - and thank you!  Rock on Bill; rock on RP...
reviews.author: Ed Ludke

reviews.comment: They have my number!
reviews.author: Susan Guardado

reviews.title: Sleep timer makes this a 5 star app
reviews.comment: Supurb app.  The timer function. Thanks for the awesome mix. Nobody does music better.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Nice new features
reviews.author: Michael Currie

reviews.comment: Best App Ever
reviews.author: Terry Coleman

reviews.title: Love the station
reviews.comment: Have been listening to RP for many years. Great eclectic mix of music, no chat, no ads, can listen all day, what\'s not to like? Widget works perfectly even if it it looks a little dated.
reviews.author: Jan Paoli

reviews.title: Works great
reviews.comment: So easy to use. My fave internet station, Brevard they play stuff I never would have sampled.
reviews.author: E Hay
